articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: India’s Virat Kohli scores 49th ODI century, equals Tendulkar’s record - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: Kohli completes his record-equalling 49th ODI hundred in the ICC Cricket World Cup match against South Africa.
articles.content:
Indias Virat Kohli has scored his 49th one-day international (ODI) hundred to equal compatriot Sachin Tendulkars world record.
Kohli completed the feat in the ICC Cricket World Cup match against Sou… [+3322 chars]
